title: transfer college club ownership
body: Okay so I made a college club for my college and no one joined and riot wants me to transfer the ownership of my club to someone else and gives no instructions on how to? I don't even attend that college anymore. **Can anyone help?**

replies.body:
You can transfer ownership of a club by hitting the *Profile* button at the top, then hit **Clubs**. Once here, you can select another member in your club and transfer ownership with the *Manage* column on the right side.

I hope this helped! If you have any other questions, let me know.
thanks i just made an account to put the club on
